channel.title: Clan Invinity [RuneScape Pure Clan]
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys. I got permission from The Soul that I could post my RuneScape clan recruitment thing or whatever here so I thought I would. :) The original post on the RuneScape forums is [url=http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/c=FZRDYvOqsYk/forums.ws?93,94,612,61332758]here[/url].[/b] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/30kyj47.png[/img] Clan post:
† Introduction / About † Welcome to the official recruitment thread for Clan Invinity. Please make sure to check back often for updates, events, and more. Please keep reading for more information on the clan, entry requirements, etc. Clan Invinity is a pure clan. We are a fairly new clan, and we are growing more every day. We do many things together, from PKing, minigames, or just hanging out. Of course, we do many more things than that. The leader of the clan is Invinity. If you would like to join our clan, please keep reading. † Information † Home World: 99 Clan colors: Black, Purple, Blue Clan Chat: Invinity † Rules † - Must follow all of Jagex/RuneScapes rules. - Must show respect to all of your clan mates. *Please note, these may be updated and it is your responsibility to read them over every time. † Ranking † The more active you are in the clan, the higher ranks you will recieve. You will also receive ranks by attending events, showing respect, and following the rules. † Memberlist † Leaders: -Invinity High Council: - Warlords: - Recruits: -I Project I -Lummyp0wer12 -Dr Macheda -Tah NubNub -1x3 of m3x1 -WaSTeD i † Requirements † You must be under 20 defence. You must have a combat level of 45 or higher. You must agree to the rules. † Application † In-game name: Combat Level: Attack Level: Strength Level: Defence Level: Hitpoints Level: Prayer Level: Ranged Level: Magic Level: Total Level: Do you agree with the rules?:
Thanks. Hope to see you soon. ;)

item.title: Clan Invinity [RuneScape Pure Clan]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Exion, post:11, topic:349951”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=446323.msg3276668#msg3276668 date=1279573911]

Is this pure clan or main clan?

Pure clan. That’s why the title says [RuneScape Pure Clan]

Make a main, my pure is 38.

My main fails If you saw it in the post your character thread. Just get to level 50 or higher and you can join.

Well not atm… Working on something

Ok.
[/quote]im still fucking joining

i chellenge u to a du-du-du-duel. ima fuck u up in da duel arnea nub.[/quote]k am close by retard

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Invinity [RuneScape Pure Clan]
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

Hey guys. I got permission from The Soul that I could post my RuneScape clan recruitment thing or whatever here so I thought I would. The original post on the RuneScape forums is here.

Clan post:

† Introduction / About †

Welcome to the official recruitment thread for Clan Invinity. Please make sure to check back often for updates, events, and more. Please keep reading for more information on the clan, entry requirements, etc. Clan Invinity is a pure clan. We are a fairly new clan, and we are growing more every day. We do many things together, from PKing, minigames, or just hanging out. Of course, we do many more things than that. The leader of the clan is Invinity. If you would like to join our clan, please keep reading.

† Information †
Home World: 99
Clan colors: Black, Purple, Blue
Clan Chat: Invinity

† Rules †

  • Must follow all of Jagex/RuneScapes rules.
  • Must show respect to all of your clan mates.
    *Please note, these may be updated and it is your responsibility to read them over every time.

† Ranking †
The more active you are in the clan, the higher ranks you will recieve. You will also receive ranks by attending events, showing respect, and following the rules.

† Memberlist †
Leaders:
-Invinity

High Council:

Warlords:

Recruits:
-I Project I
-Lummyp0wer12
-Dr Macheda
-Tah NubNub
-1x3 of m3x1
-WaSTeD i

† Requirements †
You must be under 20 defence.
You must have a combat level of 45 or higher.
You must agree to the rules.

† Application †
In-game name:
Combat Level:
Attack Level:
Strength Level:
Defence Level:
Hitpoints Level:
Prayer Level:
Ranged Level:
Magic Level:
Total Level:
Do you agree with the rules?:

Thanks. Hope to see you soon.

Read full topic
